title: Sheet Music: Danish composers
description:
[Re-uploaded on request by yojimboken]

Sheet music, classical music. All in PDF, sorted according to composer.

This is a very nice collection of Danish classical music I found a while ago on the net. And since it seems to be available only on private trackers, I decided to make a public torrent of it. There are 48 composers represented, which makes this torrent an interesting view into what the Danish music scene might have looked like in the end of the 19th century.

Some of the files were corrupt, which is why some of the numbered works misses a piece. I think have deleted all the files that are corrupt, but there might be some left. I have also added my own collection of music for these composers in the cases I had additional sheets.

[It's not as neatly sorted as usually, but I uploaded it in a hurry. Sorry 'bout that]

If some of the files have strange characters in their names,
it's probably because I have used Danish letters.
In the original files all words were spelled in an "English" manner
